models.Task: A one-off assignment for an agent with status, priority, due date, and description. Managed on a Kanban board.
models.Agent: A reference to an AI agent (id, emoji, name) used to show who a task is assigned to.

relationships: Each Task is optionally assigned to one Agent
Tasks are organized into columns by status: scheduled, queue, in-progress, done

tasks.title: Summarize weekly Slack highlights
tasks.description: Pull the top conversations and announcements from #general and #engineering channels for the past 7 days and produce a concise digest.

tasks.title: Audit landing page copy for tone
tasks.description: Review the marketing landing page and flag any sections that don't match our brand voice guidelines. Suggest rewrites where needed.

tasks.title: Generate API changelog draft
tasks.description: Compare the last two API releases and write a developer-facing changelog entry with breaking changes highlighted.

tasks.title: Research competitor pricing updates
tasks.description: Check the pricing pages of our top 5 competitors and compile a comparison table noting any changes from last quarter.

tasks.title: Draft onboarding email sequence
tasks.description: Write a 3-email welcome sequence for new users: Day 0 welcome, Day 2 feature highlight, Day 5 tips & tricks. Keep each under 200 words.

tasks.title: Translate FAQ page to Spanish
tasks.description: Translate all 12 FAQ entries to Spanish, maintaining the same friendly tone. Preserve formatting and links.

tasks.title: Classify support tickets from last week
Write unit test descriptions for auth module
tasks.description: Generate human-readable test case descriptions for all public methods in the authentication module. Output as a markdown checklist.

tasks.title: Produce social media post batch
tasks.description: Create 10 short-form social media posts promoting our new analytics dashboard feature. Mix of LinkedIn and Twitter formats.

tasks.title: Scan docs for broken links
tasks.description: Crawl all pages in our documentation site and report any broken internal or external links with their locations.
